channel.title: BayesMallows on Øystein Sørensen
channel.description: Recent content in BayesMallows on Øystein Sørensen

item.title: BayesMallows: An R Package for the Bayesian Mallows Model
item.description: This paper presents the BayesMallows R package, for analysis of rank and preference data. Published in the R Journal.

item.title: BayesMallows: Bayesian Preference Learning with the Mallows Rank Model
item.description: This R package contains functions for estimating the Bayesian Mallows model in a wide range of situation, using the Metropolis-Hastings algorithm.

item.title: Probabilistic preference learning with the Mallows rank model
item.description: This paper consider probabilistic preference learning with Mallows' rank model.
